name: License required
text: §373-2  License required.  No employment agency shall engage in business without a license obtained under this chapter and the rules of the director. [L 1959, c 264, pt of §3; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §27; Supp, §88A-2; HRS §373-2; am L 1980, c 302, pt of §2; am L 1985, c 135, §2]
